mapper.insert: insert into T_PassengerFreezeRule( TimeRange, TimeRangeUnit, ComplaintCount, FreezeTime, FreezeTimeUnit, OprId, CreateTime, Priority, CityId, IsUse, isNotVip, level, Type ) values ( #{timeRange}, #{timeRangeUnit}, #{complaintCount}, #{freezeTime}, #{freezeTimeUnit}, #{oprId}, #{createTime}, #{priority}, #{cityId}, #{isUse}, #{isNotVip}, #{level}, #{type} )
mapper.select:
select r.*, c.name as cityName, o.name as oprName from T_PassengerFreezeRule r left join T_SysOperator o on r.oprId = o.oprId left join T_SysCity c on c.cityId = r.cityId
r.CityId in (select cityId from T_SysCity cc where cc.CityId=#{cityId} or cc.ParenRegionId=#{cityId} or cc.ParenRegionId in( SELECT cityId FROM T_SysCity st WHERE st.ParenRegionId = #{cityId})) and
order by r.priority desc

select * from T_PassengerFreezeRule
cityId=#{cityId} and cityId is null and type=#{type} and isUse = 1 and
order by priority desc
